title: Chris Foale Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Chris Foale? Check out all of Chris Foale's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogChris Foale Chris Foale Chris Foale is Similarweb's principal customer success manager, who guides each of our customers to their unique, individual "Eureka!" moment with our market intelligence offering. Chris comes from an ad agency background and has over 10 years experience working with some of the biggest consumer-facing brands in the world, specializing in retail and ecommerce. Outside of work he enjoys performing in musical theatre and spending time with his wife and two young boys. Show more Insights How Ninja Is Outpacing Rivals With a Smarter PPC Strategy Marketing Insights by Chris Foale 3 Min. Jun 6, 2024 Wondering what Similarweb can do for your business? Give it a try or talk to our insights team — don’t worry, it’s free! Sign up for free Talk to an expert
